name: Galaxy Dash Theme with Pokemon Icons (2)
description:
I edited the Galaxy Dash Theme with Gen 1 water Pokemon to accomodate the new dashboard coding.
My tumblr is callmeboss-.tumblr.com. Follow if you like it.

Basically, it's a bunch a dash theme smashed with two different icon codes together.
Original coding: Andrewbrooksie
Gen 1 Water Pokemon icons from: ljsquid
Icon coding: emmyreckless

Screenshot provided is not what the dash theme actually looks like.
ACTUAL PREVIEW HERE: http://i49.tinypic.com/69eu6b.png
